item.title: Ep. 3: S12 Cinematic, TFT Scam, Player Focussed & Lots Of COPIUM w/ NickyBoi
item.description:
Also available on: Youtube: https://youtu.be/31oiJ7vhsa0 Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/wooddivisionpodcast Spotify: https://open.spotify.com/show/7xmky7LVOqgia25QnOTNML
0:00 - Intro 2:36 - S12 Cinematic 19:20 - FULL ON VOID EVENT COPIUM 22:05 - "the next 5 years at Riot Games" article 28:14 - Skins 31:31 - TFT Scam, Necrit is malding 43:00 - "I like money", NickyBoi malding and Ahri ASU 01:01:15 - Adding a toggle & feedback 01:16:20 - NickyBoi and the LPP 01:24:40 - PvP anxiety, PvE is cool/better 01:36:00 - Creativity, content around and outside of League 02:01:12 - Rapidfire: April Fools Bamboozling 02:03:58 - Rapidfire: WildRift's music Content ID'ed? 02:10:00 - Rapidfire: What happens if Ezreal kisses VGU Shyvana's leg 02:20:31 - Rapidfire: VFX Update 02:24:40 - Champion age based on lore 02:28:44 - Robot Battle Bunny malding & Floaty Kai'Sa shoulders 02:36:12 - TFT Scam p2, Necrit is still malding 02:44:31 - Predicting future content & voicelines 02:56:50 - Wrapping it up
item.itunes:author: Necrit SkinSpotlights Chibiin and NickyBoi

item.title: Ep. 2: SoL Recap, Possible Void Event and Leaks
item.description:
Also available on: Youtube: https://youtu.be/c0Ri-adYm-I Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/wooddivisionpodcast Spotify: https://open.spotify.com/show/7xmky7LVOqgia25QnOTNML
0:00 - Intro 0:54 - Kshaway & the "Wood Division" name 3:18 - SoL Recap 17:35 - LoL should take notes from Fortnite and HotS 24:23 - Final words about SoL 26:07 - Screwing up & Champion Design 29:09 - Arcane S2 in 2023 35:51 - Possible Void Event 47:07 - Leaks 54:04 - Chibiin has a mental breakdown 55:21 - Leaks p2 1:02:04 - ⚠ MESSAGE FOR RIOT ⚠ 1:04:20 - Leaks p3 1:12:25 - Little Legends Collection 1:16:33 - Leaks p4 1:23:40 - Classic Models and Skins 1:26:15 - Rapidfire: EDG Skins & the Aphelios nightmare 1:28:56 - Rapidfire: Necrits future big project 1:29:58 - Rapidfire: Necrits workflow 1:32:05 - Rapidfire: Necrits vacation, Minecraft subathon and Hytale 1:37:16 - Wrapping it up

item.title: Ep. 1: Arcane, The Ruined King, and Evolving Content
item.description:
